overview: Army GRUNTS have always been guinea pigs. For years the top brass has used enlisted soldiers for medical experiments in efforts to advance military science. GRUNTS: Brothers in Arms is the real story behind the development of the Gay Bomb - a true story taken straight from the front page of the New York Times! It is also the story of twin brothers - played by RSS superstar Steve Cruz and European heartthrob Orlando Toro. The Ramirez brothers are mirror images of one another - each a blistering hot stud who gets off on having sex. GRUNTS: Brothers in Arms is a brilliant display of sex like you have never seen filmed before. It's an instant classic from America's top studio!
title: Grunts: Brothers in Arms
